english.segment1: We are standing at the crossroads. And now it's time. For you to go your way. And me to go mine. I will pray the Lord. Will keep you safe. Until the day I see your face again
english.segment2: Chorus: My friend. We have been through so much. And you have been my Godsend. With your sure and steady love. My friend. You know I will be there. If you ever need. 'Cause you've always. Been a friend to me
english.segment3: I may travel the world over. But one thing I know for sure. One day this road will lead me. Back 'round to your door. I will pray the Lord. Will keep you safe. Some bonds are just too strong. To break in the end
english.segment5: Nothing will change the way. I feel about you. Not the miles or the years. Or the place this life takes me to
